subject: Quick review of the Q1 deck before Friday?
body:
Hey,

When you get a chance, could you take a look at the Q1 summary deck I attached and leave comments? I need to present it to leadership on Friday and want to make sure the numbers and narrative are solid.

No need for a full line-by-line—just any high-level feedback or spots that feel unclear. If you're swamped, even a quick pass would help.

Thanks,
Sarah

subject: Reschedule: Product sync
body:
Hi,

Something came up on my side and I won't be able to make our 2pm product sync tomorrow. Would you be open to moving it to Thursday or Friday? I'm free 10am–12pm or after 3pm either day.

Let me know what works and I'll send the update to the rest of the group.

Cheers,
Mike

subject: Re: Brand assets for the campaign
body:
Hi,

Following up on the brand assets—do you know when the final logo variants and approved color palette will be ready? We're aiming to lock the campaign creative by end of week and those are the last pieces we're waiting on.

If there's a delay, even a rough ETA would help so we can adjust the timeline on our side.

Thanks,
Jessica
